sentence.Network_en: When an accident happens, quite correctly questions are asked.
sentence.Network_cn: 当事故发生时，理所当然要询问一些情况。

sentence.Network_en: It is important to judge the weight of your washing load correctly.
sentence.Network_cn: 正确估计待洗衣物的重量很重要。

sentence.Network_en: My own mother was brought up very strictly and correctly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我母亲从小接受严格而规范的教育。

entry.def: If something is correct, it is in accordance with the facts and has no mistakes.

example.ex: The correct answers can be found at the bottom of page 8...
The following information was correct at time of going to press...
example.tran: 下列信息在付印时准确无误。

entry.def: If someone is correct, what they have said or thought is true.

example.ex: You are absolutely correct. The leaves are from a bay tree...
example.tran: 你说得很对，这是月桂树的叶子。

example.ex: If Casey is correct, the total cost of the cleanup would come to $110 billion.
example.tran: 如果凯西是对的，清理的总花费将达1,100亿美元。

entry.def: The correct thing or method is the thing or method that is required or is most suitable in a particular situation.

example.ex: The use of the correct materials was crucial...
example.tran: 使用恰当的材料至关重要。

example.ex: White was in no doubt the referee made the correct decision.
example.tran: 怀特确信裁判作出了公正的判罚。

entry.def: If you say that someone is correct in doing something, you approve of their action.

example.ex: You are perfectly correct in trying to steer your mother towards increased independence...
example.tran: 你试图让自己的母亲变得越来越独立，这样做很正确。

example.ex: I think the president was correct to reject the offer.
example.tran: 我认为总统拒绝这一提议是正确的。

entry.tran: 纠正(问题);改正，修正(错误)
entry.def: If you correct a problem, mistake, or fault, you do something which puts it right.

example.ex: He may need surgery to correct the problem...
example.tran: 要解决这个问题，他可能需要做外科手术。

example.ex: He has criticised the government for inefficiency and delays in correcting past mistakes.
example.tran: 他批评政府在纠正过去的错误问题上效率低下，并且拖拖拉拉。

entry.def: If you correct someone, you say something which you think is more accurate or appropriate than what they have just said.

example.ex: 'Actually, that isn't what happened,' George corrects me...
example.tran: “实际上，并不是那样，”乔治纠正我。

example.ex: I must correct him on a minor point.
example.tran: 我必须纠正他的一处小错误。

entry.def: When someone corrects a piece of writing, they look at it and mark the mistakes in it.

example.ex: It took an extraordinary effort to focus on preparing his classes or correcting his students' work.
example.tran: 备课和批改学生的作业花费了他很多精力。

entry.tran: (行为)符合社会公认标准的，得体的
entry.def: If a person or their behaviour is correct, their behaviour is in accordance with social or other rules.

example.ex: I think English men are very polite and very correct...
example.tran: 我认为英国人很有礼貌，举止非常得体。

example.ex: We were rather surprised by their sporting and correct behaviour.
example.tran: 他们富有体育精神而且举止得体，让我们感到相当惊讶。

entry.tran: 若是我说错了就请指出
entry.def: You say 'correct me if I'm wrong' to indicate that you are not entirely sure that what you are about to say is true.

example.ex: As I recall, but correct me if I'm wrong, it was in a car park in Carmarthen.
example.tran: 如果我没记错的话，那是在卡马森的一个停车场内。

auth_sentence.content: That's why this money should be spent correctly.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's why this money should be spent correctly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's why this money should be spent correctly.

auth_sentence.content: You correctly state that pyrethroid resistance has been demonstrated.
auth_sentence.res_content: You correctly state that pyrethroid resistance has been demonstrated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You correctly state that pyrethroid resistance has been demonstrated.

Sentence.sentence: On the basis of the police report, the Lummis Accident Committee correctly determined that McLaughlin had been quite careless.
You problem may not be understood correctly.
These students weren't able to complete the problems correctly.

sentences.en: Has the form been correctly completed?
sentences.cn: 表格已经正确地填好了吗？

sentences.en: He behaved correctly,according to his lights.
sentences.cn: 他按自己的见解正确行事。

sentences.en: Article 10provides that all businesses must be registered correctly.
sentences.cn: 第十款规定所有的企业必须正确地登记注冊。
